#!/usr/bin/python
import pycurl import sys
from StringIO import StringIO
buffer = StringIO()
c=pycurl.Curl() c.setopt(c.URL, '%{ssh-host}') c.setopt(c.WRITEFUNCTION, buffer.write) c.perform() c.close()
body=buffer.getvalue() if 'error' in body.lower(): sys.stderr.write("Error found in Drupal home page. View http://%{ssh-host} for details\n") sys.exit(1)
